name: The Gluten Farm (#LD52)
description:
Completed in 8h30 for the Ludum Dare 52.

Controls :

  • Space to play
  • Arrows keys to move the combine harvester

Harvest the weat to produce more gluten for humanity.
Avoid ckickens and bundles.
Harvest 100% of the field to win.

Tools :

  • C# / Monogame
  • No external lib
  • GFX are 8x8 tiles created with TIC-80 and exported as PNG
